statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, customer_id, initiative_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT initiative_id, customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, initiative_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE initiative_id = 2 AND rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 101 AND rating > 3 ORDER BY initiative_id, feedback_id;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%' AND initiative_id = 4 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id < 100 AND customer_id = 201 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_initiatives WHERE start_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_initiatives WHERE end_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY initiative_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_responsibility_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM social_responsibility_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details;
SELECT feedback_id, analysis_results FROM feedback_analysis;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM social_responsibility_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_responsibility_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM social_responsibility_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT analysis_id, feedback_id, analysis_results FROM feedback_analysis WHERE analysis_results IS NOT NULL;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM social_responsibility_feedback INNER JOIN customer_details ON social_responsibility_feedback.customer_id = customer_details.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name FROM initiative WHERE initiative_desc IS NOT NULL;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback_rating ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT analysis_result FROM feedback_analysis WHERE feedback_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_desc FROM initiative WHERE initiative_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY initiative_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 101 AND feedback_text LIKE '%improvement%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback_rating GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING avg_rating > 3;
SELECT analysis_id, feedback_id, analysis_result FROM feedback_analysis WHERE feedback_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 102) ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_analysis FROM feedback_analysis ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segment WHERE segment_name LIKE '%VIP%';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT f.feedback_id, f.feedback_text, i.initiative_name FROM feedback AS f LEFT JOIN initiatives AS i ON f.feedback_id = i.initiative_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, c.contact_email, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customers AS c INNER JOIN feedback AS f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;

SELECT fa.analysis_id, f.feedback_text, i.initiative_name, fa.sentiment_analysis FROM feedback_analysis AS fa INNER JOIN feedback AS f ON fa.feedback_id = f.feedback_id INNER JOIN initiatives AS i ON fa.initiative_id = i.initiative_id WHERE fa.feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
